holidays.title: Tax Day
holidays.description: Federal income taxes are an important cornerstone of our economy.

holidays.title: Adult Autism Awareness Day
holidays.description: Adult Autism Awareness Day aims to empower adults with autism and their loved ones.

holidays.title: International Day for Monuments and Sites
holidays.description: Celebrate International Day for Monuments and Sites by visiting monuments and heritage sites.

holidays.title: International Jugglers Day
holidays.description: Ever been to a circus and wished you could juggle? Why not learn today?

holidays.title: Linemen Appreciation Day
holidays.description: On this day, show appreciation to the people in charge of providing electricity!

holidays.title: National Animal Crackers Day
holidays.description: Who can resist the temptation to indulge in these iconic treats of our childhood?

holidays.title: National Exercise Day
holidays.description: Grab your water bottle and your running shoes, today is the day to start exercising.

holidays.title: National Lineman Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Not every holiday's lucky enough to have a classic pop song attached to it.

holidays.title: National Lydia Day
holidays.description: Learn more about the origins of this name and discover some notable women with this name.

holidays.title: National Newspaper Columnists Day
holidays.description: This National Newspaper Columnists Day is a perfect opportunity to honor these hard workers.

holidays.title: National Velociraptor Awareness Day
holidays.description: "We designed it, we built it, and then they discovered it. That still boggles my mind."

holidays.title: Pet Owners Independence Day
holidays.description: We nap in the sunlight and leave the work in the paws of our furry friends.

holidays.title: Piñata Day
holidays.description: Life’s a party! Whack that piñata and enjoy all the goodies that fall out!

holidays.title: World Amateur Radio Day
holidays.description: Amateur radio operators provide emergency communications during both natural and man-made disasters.

holidays.title: Conan O'Brien’s Birthday
holidays.description: This TV host and comedian has been a consistent part of many people’s lives.

holidays.title: David Tennant’s Birthday
holidays.description: The 10th ‘Doctor’ has done television, theater, and film, proving that he is unstoppable.

holidays.title: Kourtney Kardashian’s Birthday
holidays.description: This famous media personality, socialite, and model is cutting her own path to success.

holidays.title: Lillee Jean’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this famous Instagram star, YouTuber, and entrepreneur who is making a name for herself.
